sqlMap.statement:
SELECT $codeColumn$ CODE, $nameColumn$ NAME FROM $schemaId$.$tableName$
$where$
ORDER BY $nameColumn$ ASC
ORDER BY $sortColumn$ ASC

SELECT $codeColumn$ CODE, '[' || $codeColumn$ || ']' || $nameColumn$ NAME FROM $schemaId$.$tableName$
$where$
ORDER BY NAME ASC
SELECT CODE CODE, CODENAME NAME FROM $schemaId$.TSEAICM20 WHERE CODEGROUP = #codeGroup# ORDER BY SEQ

SELECT VLD_VAL CODE, VLD_VAL_NM NAME FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIMX04 WHERE DEL_YN ='N'
UPPER_VLD_VAL = #upperVal#
AND $searchType$ = #param# ORDER BY 1
